The purpose study determine effectiveness intermittent pneumatic compression system low extremity order reduce vasopressor drug requirement maintain hemodynamic stability pregnant woman undergo elective caesarean section spinal anaesthesia .
DOC.brief_title: Prevention Maternal Hypotension During Elective Caesarean Section Performed With Spinal Anaesthesia , Through Intermittent Pneumatic Compression System Lower Extremities
DOC.criteria: Pregnant woman 18 year schedule elective caesarean section third quarter pregnancy . Inform Consent sign . Caesarean section urgent / emergent Caesarean section epidural anaesthesia Caesarean section multiple pregnancy Obstetric Pathology : Preeclampsia , Eclampsia , HELLP syndrome ( Hemolysis Elevated Liver enzymes Low Platelet count ) , Small gestational age ( SGA ) , preterm ( < 32 week ) Valvular heart disease / ischemic High blood pressure diagnose treatment . Sepsis Morbid obesity ( BMI > 40 ) Insulindependent diabetes Block level achieve spinal anaesthesia > T5 Patients meet study protocol
